title: He lays His Hand, He lays His hand on me, I am so glad, He lays His hand on me. Once l was blind but now I can see, Since Jesus laid His hand on me.
lyrics: He lays His Hand, He lays His hand on me, I am so glad, He lays His hand on me. Once l was blind but now I can see, Since Jesus laid His hand on me.
lowercaseTitle: he lays his hands on me
lowercaseLyrics:
he lays his hand,
he lays his hand on me,
i am so glad, he lays his hand on me.
once l was blind but now i can see,
since jesus laid
his hand on me.
